user_input: Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Use the original file 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED' and save it as 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED'.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Modify the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999 using the original file 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED' and saving the result as 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999.', select the most appropriate file from the following list.
